forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending this morning. Remaining cloudy. High 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. High 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
